header.title: os_mon_mib

description.p: Functions for loading and unloading the OTP-OS-MON-MIB into/from an SNMP agent. The instrumentation of the OTP-OS-MON-MIB uses Mnesia, hence Mnesia must be started prior to loading the OTP-OS-MON-MIB.
